title: Behind chummy public persona, Joe Biden terrorizes staff
text:
Behind chummy public persona, Joe Bid... Behind chummy public persona, Joe Biden terrorizes staff There are 4 comments on the New York Post story from 15 hrs ago, titled Behind chummy public persona, Joe Biden terrorizes staff . In it, New York Post reports that: 
New Yorker writer George Packer's 2013 book, " The Unwinding ," tells the story of the modern United States through the eyes of a few Americans - including Jeff Connaughton, who worked as a lawyer, a lobbyist and a Wall Street banker. But he was always a "Biden guy," drifting back to work for Vice President Joe Biden's campaigns over the decades. Join the discussion below, or Read more at New York Post.
